TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_001.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a CONNACK Control Packet with valid header flags.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_002.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to a CONNECT Control Packet with clean_session set to 1 with a CONNACK Control Packet with session_present_flag set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_003.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to a CONNECT Control Packet for a present session with a CONNACK Control Packet with session_present_flag set to 1.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_004.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to a CONNECT Control Packet with clean_session set to 1

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_005.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to protocol levels which it does not support with return code 0x01.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_006.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to CONNECT Control Packets with a zero-byte client_identifier and clean_session set to 0

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_007.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to a CONNECT Control Packet with a malformed user_name with CONNACK with connect_return_code set to 0x04.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_008.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to a CONNECT Control Packet with a invalid user_name with CONNACK with connect_return_code set to 0x05.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_009.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to a CONNECT Control Packet with a invalid password with CONNACK with connect_return_code set to 0x05.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNACK_010.objective: Verify that the IUT responds with CONNECT with connect_return_code set to 0x03 if the MQTT service is unavailable.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in CONNECT Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_002.objective: Verify that the IUT either disconnects the client or continues processing the CONNECT Control Packet if the protocol name does not correspond to 'MQTT'.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_003.objective: Verify that the IUT responds to supported protocol levels (in scope: MQTT-3.1.1) with the return code 0x00.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_004.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the reserved flags in the CONNECT Control Packet.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_005.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_topic and will_message fields if the will_flag is set to 1.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_006.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the the will_topic and will_message fields to be omitted if the will_flag is set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_007.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_qos field to be set to 0 if the will_flag is set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_008.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_qos field and rejects connections with an invalid will_qos value.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_009.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_qos field if the will_flag is set to 1.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_010.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_flag and will_retain flags to be set correctly.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_011.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_retain flag to be set to 0 if the will_flag is set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_012.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the password flag to be set to 0 if the user_name_flag is set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_013.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the username field to be omitted if the user_name_flag is set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_014.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a payload is present if the user_name_flag is set to 1.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_015.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the password field to be omitted if the password_flag is set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_016.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the password field to be present if the password_flag is set to 1.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_017.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the client_identifier to be between 1 and 23 UTF-8 encoded bytes in length.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_018.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the client_identifier to contain only alphanumeric characters [0-9a-zA-Z].

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_019.objective: Verify that the IUT accepts client_identifiers of zero byte length.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_020.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the client_identifier to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_021.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the client_identifier to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_022.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_topic to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_023.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_topic to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_024.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_topic to not contain single-level topic filters.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_025.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the will_topic to not contain multi-level topic filters.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_026.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the user_name to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_027.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the user_name to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_028.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the first MQTT Control Packet sent from the client to the server after a TCP connection is a MQTT CONNECT.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_029.objective: Verify that the IUT detects multiple MQTT CONNECT Control Packets sent from a client within a single session as a protocol violation.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_030.objective: Verify that the IUT detects multiple clients with the same client_identifier and disconnects the existing client.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_031.objective: Verify that the IUT validates all topic names to be at least one character long.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECT_032.objective: Verify that the IUT does not process any data sent by the client after a rejected CONNECT Control Packet.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_DISCONNECT_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in DISCONNECT Control Packet are valid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_DISCONNECT_002.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in DISCONNECT Control Packet are valid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_KEEPALIVE_001.objective: Verify that the IUT disconnects a client if it does not receive a Control Packet

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_001.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity established the MQTT_CONNECTION containing
		flags containing
		will_flag indicating value '1'B,
		payload containing
		will_topic corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		will_message corresponding to PX_WILL_MESSAGE;
		;;
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_001.objective: Verify that the IUT sends a Will Messages to subscribes if a client with LWT disconnects unexpectedly.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_002.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity established the MQTT_CONNECTION containing
		flags containing
		will_flag indicating value '1'B,
		payload containing
		will_topic corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		will_message corresponding to PX_WILL_MESSAGE;
		;;
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_002.objective: Verify that the IUT deletes a Will Messages if the client with LWT disconnects

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_003.objective: Verify that the IUT sends no Will Message if a client without LWT disconnects unexpectedly.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_004.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity established the MQTT_CONNECTION containing
		flags containing
		will_retain indicating value '1'B,
		will_flag indicating value '1'B,
		payload containing
		will_topic corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		will_message corresponding to PX_WILL_MESSAGE;
		;;
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity closed the TCP_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_004.objective: Verify that the IUT handles Will Messages with will_retain set to 1 as Retained Will Messages.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_005.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity established the MQTT_CONNECTION containing
		flags containing
		will_retain indicating value '0'B,
		will_flag indicating value '1'B,
		payload containing
		will_topic corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		will_message corresponding to PX_WILL_MESSAGE;
		;;
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity closed the TCP_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_LWT_005.objective: Verify that the IUT handles Will Messages with will_retain set to 1 as non-retained Will Messages.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_001.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_001.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the UTF-8 encoded sequence 0xEF 0xBB 0xBF

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_002.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the TOPIC_FILTER_WITH_ZWNBS
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_002.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the UTF-8 encoded sequence 0xEF 0xBB 0xBF

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_003.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the TOPIC_FILTER_MULTI_LEVEL_ALL
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_003.objective: Verify that the IUT does not match topic filters starting with a multi-level wildcard character (#)

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_004.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the TOPIC_FILTER_SINGLE_LEVEL
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_004.objective: Verify that the IUT does not match topic filters starting with a single-level wildcard character (+)

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_005.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the TOPIC_FILTER_MULTI_LEVEL_SYS_ALL
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_005.objective: Verify that the IUT does match topic names and filters beginning with a $ character.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_006.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC containing
		requested_qos corresponding to AT_LEAST_ONCE;
		to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity sent a PUBLISH message containing
		publish_header containing
			qos_level corresponding to AT_LEAST_ONCE,
		topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_1;
		;
		to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity sent a PUBLISH message containing
		publish_header containing
			qos_level corresponding to AT_LEAST_ONCE,
		topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_2;
		;
		to the IUT entity
		and
		the IUT entity sent a PUBLISH message containing
		publish_header containing
			qos_level corresponding to AT_LEAST_ONCE,
		topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_1;
		;
		to the CLIENT_2 entity
		and
		the IUT entity sent a PUBLISH message containing
		publish_header containing
			qos_level corresponding to AT_LEAST_ONCE,
		topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_2;
		;
		to the CLIENT_2 entity
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_006.objective: Verify that the IUT resends PUBLISH Control Packets in the order in which

		;
		to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity sent a PUBLISH message containing
		publish_header containing
			qos_level corresponding to EXACTLY_ONCE,
		topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_2;
		;
		to the IUT entity
		and
		the IUT entity sent a PUBLISH message containing
		publish_header containing
			qos_level corresponding to EXACTLY_ONCE,
		topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_1;
		;
		to the CLIENT_2 entity
		and
		the IUT entity sent a PUBLISH message containing
		publish_header containing
			qos_level corresponding to EXACTLY_ONCE,
		topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
		packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_2;
		;
		to the CLIENT_2 entity
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_PUBSUB_007.objective: Verify that the IUT resends PUBLISH Control Packets in the order in which

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_QOS_001.objective: Verify that the IUT delivers PUBLISH Control Packets (in case of overlapping topic filter)

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_QOS_002.objective: Verify that the IUT delivers PUBLISH Control Packets (in case of overlapping topic filter)

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_QOS_003.objective: Verify that the IUT delivers PUBLISH Control Packets (in case of overlapping topic filter)

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_QOS_004.objective: Verify that the IUT delivers PUBLISH Control Packets (in case of overlapping topic filter)

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_QOS_005.objective: Verify that the IUT delivers PUBLISH Control Packets (in case of overlapping topic filter)

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_REMLEN_001.objective: Verify that the IUT forwards PUBLISH Control Packets with Remaining Length fields encoded in one byte.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_REMLEN_002.objective: Verify that the IUT forwards PUBLISH Control Packets with Remaining Length fields encoded in two bytes.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_REMLEN_003.objective: Verify that the IUT forwards PUBLISH Control Packets with Remaining Length fields encoded in three bytes.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_REMLEN_004.objective: Verify that the IUT forwards PUBLISH Control Packets with Remaining Length fields encoded in four bytes.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_001.init:
with {
		the IUT entity having a UTF8_MESSAGE_VALID in the RETAIN_TOPIC entity
		and
		the CLIENT entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT entity having a CLEAN_SESSION
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_001.objective: Verify that the IUT does not delete Retained Messages when a session with the corresponding client ends.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_002.init:
with {
			 the CLIENT_1 entity published a Message containing
				 dup_flag indicating value '0'B,
				 qos_level corresponding to AT_LEAST_ONCE,
				 retain_flag indicating value '1'B,
				 topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
			packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_1,
			payload corresponding to PAYLOAD;
			 to the IUT entity
			 and
			 the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_002.objective: Verify that the IUT stores Retained Messages for future deliveries.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_003.objective: Verify that the IUT sets the retain_flag to 0 when Retained Messages are delivered

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_004.objective: Verify that the IUT forwards Retained Messages with a zero-bytes payload.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_005.objective: Verify that the IUT deletes a stored Retained Messages if it receives a new Retained Message with a zero-bytes payload.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_006.objective: Verify that the IUT does neither store a Retained Message nor removes or

TP_MQTT_BROKER_FEAT_RTND_007.objective: Verify that the IUT stores Retained Messages with a QoS level of 0 for future deliveries.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PINGREQ_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in PINGREQ Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PINGRESP_001.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a PINGRESP Control Packet with valid header flags.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBACK_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in PUBACK Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBACK_002.objective: Verify that the IUT sends PUBACK Control Packets in the order in which the corresponding QoS 1 PUBLISH Control Packets were received.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBCOMP_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in PUBCOMP Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_001.objective: Verify that the IUT accepts only QoS 0 PUBLISH Control Packets with the dup_flag set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_002.objective: Verify that the IUT accepts only PUBLISH Control Packets with a valid QoS level.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_003.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_name in a PUBLISH Control Packet to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_004.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_name in a PUBLISH Control Packet to not contain multi-level wildcard characters.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_005.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_name in a PUBLISH Control Packet to not contain single-level wildcard characters.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_006.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_name in a PUBLISH Control Packet to be at least on character long.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_007.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_name in a PUBLISH Control Packet to not contain the null character (Unicode U+0000).

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_008.objective: Verify that the IUT rejects QoS 0 PUBLISH Control Packets with the dup_flag set to 1.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_009.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a QoS 0 PUBLISH Control Packet to not contain a packet_identifier.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_010.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a QoS 1 PUBLISH Control Packet to contain a non-zero 16-bit Packet Identifier.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_011.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a QoS 2 PUBLISH Control Packet to contain a non-zero 16-bit Packet Identifier.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBLISH_012.objective: Verify that the IUT handles not authorized PUBLISH Control Packets with either a positive PUBACK Control Packet or by closing the network connection.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBREC_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in PUBREC Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBREC_002.objective: Verify that the IUT sends PUBREC Control Packets in the order in which the corresponding QoS 2 PUBLISH Control Packets were received.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBREL_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in PUBREL Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBREL_002.init:
with {
		the CLIENT_1 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity having a MQTT_CONNECTION to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_2 entity subscribed the PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC containing
			qos_level corresponding to EXACTLY_ONCE;
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity delivered a PUBLISH message containing
			qos_level corresponding to EXACTLY_ONCE,
			topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
			packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_1;
		to the IUT entity
		and
		the CLIENT_1 entity delivered a PUBLISH message containing
			qos_level corresponding to EXACTLY_ONCE,
			topic_name corresponding to PX_PUBLISH_TOPIC,
			packet_identifier corresponding to PACKET_ID_2;
		to the IUT entity
	}
TP_MQTT_BROKER_PUBREL_002.objective: Verify that the IUT sends PUBREL Control Packets in the order in which the corresponding PUBREC Control Packets were received.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SEC_CVE_001.objective: Verify that the IUT does not crash on reception of a malformed SUBSCRIBE Control Packet.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SEC_CVE_002.objective: Verify that the IUT does not crash on reception of a malformed PUBLISH Control Packet having topic names prefixed with '$SYS'.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBACK_001.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a SUBACK Control Packet with valid header flags.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBACK_002.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a SUBACK Control Packet containing a

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBACK_003.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a SUBACK Control Packet with a valid maximum QoS level.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBACK_004.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a SUBACK Control Packet with a valid maximum QoS level.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBACK_005.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a SUBACK Control Packet with a valid maximum QoS level.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBACK_006.objective: Verify that the IUT replies to a failed subscription with a SUBACK Control Packet with the return code 0x80.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in SUBSCRIBE Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_002.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a SUBSCRIBE Control Packet to contain a non-zero 16-bit Packet Identifier.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_003.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_filter in a SUBSCRIBE Control Packet to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string and do not contain code points between U+D800 and U+DFFF.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_004.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_filter in a SUBSCRIBE Control Packet to be a well-formed UTF-8 encoded string and do not contain the null character (Unicode U+0000).

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_005.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_filter in a SUBSCRIBE Control Packet to be at least on character long.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_006.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a SUBSCRIBE Control Packet to contain at least one topic filter/QoS pair.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_007.objective: Verify that the IUT validates in a SUBSCRIBE Control Packet the upper 6 bits of a requested QoS byte (reserved bits) to be set to 0.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_008.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the requested_qos field to be a valid QoS level.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_009.objective: Verify that the IUT validates topic_filter field to be a valid multi-level Topic Fiilter.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_SUBSCRIBE_011.objective: Verify that the IUT allows topic_filter field to include the 'zero width no-break space character'

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBACK_001.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with an UNSUBACK Control Packet with valid header flags.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBACK_002.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with a UNSUBACK Control Packet containing a

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBACK_003.objective: Verify that the IUT replies with an UNSUBACK Control Packet even if no topic subscriptions are deleted.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBACK_004.objective: Verify that the IUT replies to UNSUBSCRIBE Control Packets with multiple topic filters

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBSCRIBE_001.objective: Verify that the IUT closes the network connection if fixed header flags in UNSUBSCRIBE Control Packet are invalid.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBSCRIBE_002.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a UNSUBSCRIBE Control Packet to contain a non-zero 16-bit Packet Identifier.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBSCRIBE_003.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic_filter in a UNSUBSCRIBE Control Packet

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBSCRIBE_004.objective: Verify that the IUT validates all topic filters to be at least one character long.

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBSCRIBE_005.objective: Verify that the IUT validates the topic filter in a UNSUBSCRIBE Control Packet not to contain the null character (Unicode U+0000).

TP_MQTT_BROKER_UNSUBSCRIBE_006.objective: Verify that the IUT validates a UNSUBSCRIBE Control Packet to contain at least on topic filter.
